theForsaken:JudgementScales.NAME: Judgement Scales
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, gain #b1 #yStrength if you've played no attacks, and #b1 #yDexterity if you've played no skills.

theForsaken:PaleLantern.NAME: Pale Lantern
theForsaken:PaleLantern.FLAVOR: Provides a comforting glow in the dark.

theForsaken:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theForsaken:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theForsaken:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theForsaken:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
